transformations.name: AlterRow
transformations.description: Upsert if pk key is not null

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		pk_key as string,
		cur_oecd as string,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		inserted_by as string,
		cur_last_exch_rate_to_usd as decimal(28,10),
		last_updated_by as string,
		cur_description as string,
		cur_2ltr_code as string,
		cur_eu as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from\ndwh_prepare.pre_dim_currency',
	format: 'query',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_currency.parquet']) ~> preDimCurrency
source(output(
		maxVal as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select max(dimension_key) as maxVal from\nmarts.dim_currency',
	format: 'query') ~> dimCurrencyMaxDimKey
preDimCurrency derive(top_key = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Currencies') ~> DeriveTopLevel
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
DeriveTopLevel, dimCurrencyMaxDimKey join(true(),
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 keyGenerate(output(dimension_key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey
SurrogateKey derive(dimension_key = case(isNull(maxVal),dimension_key,dimension_key + maxVal)) ~> DerivedColumn1
AlterRow sink(input(
		dimension_key as long,
		tot_description as string,
		tot_code as string,
		cur_description as string,
		cur_id as long,
		cur_last_exch_rate_to_usd as decimal(28,10),
		cur_eu as string,
		cur_iso_code as string,
		cur_oecd as string,
		cur_2ltr_code as string,
		tot_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		tot_description = top_description,
		tot_code = top_key,
		cur_description,
		cur_last_exch_rate_to_usd,
		cur_eu,
		cur_iso_code = pk_key,
		cur_oecd,
		cur_2ltr_code
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dimCurrency
